pullrequest.title: Word-wrapping in treeviews and item views, adapted from David Meyer's implementation.

content.raw:
Might have a quick think about the centering, but might be not worth it if a simple solution doesn’t present itself.

The flickering I think is style-dependent. The whole row remains highlighted blue for me, whereas for you there is a grey highlight for other cells during editing. Basically the colour of the highlight is focus-dependent for you and not for me. I could probably make it the same across platforms just by setting the style of the widget to whatever it is for me.

I’ve tried setting the style to ‘Fusion’. For me this is no change, so I’ll check how it looks in Windows to confirm it isn’t grossly at odds with the rest of the GUI and if it fixes the flickering.
